languages.text: "Разумно. Если бы мне приходилось даровать Милость Императора, чтобы поднять своих солдат из траншей, я бы тоже так поступал".
"Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."
languages.original_text: "Разумно. Если бы мне приходилось даровать Милость Императора, чтобы поднять своих солдат из траншей, я бы тоже так поступал".

traits.locale_text: "Makes sense. If I had to grant the Emperor's Grace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd rather not remember either."
"Makes sense. If I had to grant the Emperor's Grace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd rather not remember either."
"Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Grace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."
"Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Grace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."
"Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

languages.text: “这话有道理。如果我不得不采取帝皇安息这种最终手段，才能让我的人离开战壕，那我宁愿根本不记得这些。”
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: “这话有道理。如果我不得不采取帝皇恩典这种最终手段，才能让我的人离开战壕，那我宁愿根本不记得这些。”

languages.text: «Tiene sentido. Si tuviera que conceder la Paz del Emperador para sacar a mi gente de las trincheras, yo también preferiría olvidarlo».
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene sentido. Si tuviera que conceder la Gracia del Emperador para sacar a mi gente de las trincheras, yo también preferiría olvidarlo».

languages.text: 「そうだな。もし皇帝陛下の安らぎを与えて塹壕から部下を出さなければならないとなれば、私もその名を覚えていたくはないな」
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな。もし皇帝陛下の安らぎを与えて塹壕から部下を出さなければならないとなれば、私もその名を覚えていたくはないな」

languages.text: "Verständlich. Hätte ich den Frieden des Imperators gewähren müssen, um meine Leute aus den Gräben zu kriegen, würde ich mich auch nicht erinnern wollen."
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: "Verständlich. Hätte ich die Gnade des Imperators gewähren müssen, um meine Leute aus den Gräben zu kriegen, würde ich mich auch nicht erinnern wollen."

languages.text: « Logique. Si j'avais dû accorder la Paix de l'Empereur pour tirer mes hommes des tranchées, je préférerais ne pas m'en souvenir non plus. »
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: « Logique. Si j'avais dû m'en remettre à la Grâce de l'Empereur pour tirer mes hommes des tranchées, j'aurais préféré ne pas m'en souvenir non plus. »

languages.text: "Mantıklı. Adamlarımı siperlerden çıkarmak için İmparator'un Huzuru'nu bahşetmem gerekecek olsaydı ben de isimleri hatırlamamayı tercih ederdim."
languages.original_text: "Makes sense. If I'd had to grant the Emperor's Peace to get my men out of the trenches, I'd prefer not to remember either."

traits.locale_text: "Mantıklı. Adamlarımı siperlerden çıkarmak için İmparator'un Huzuru'nu bahşetmem gerekecek olsaydı ben de isimleri hatırlamamayı tercih ederdim."
